name: The Midas Touch
description:
This game is about the  Greek myth of the Midas touch 

if you want to learn more about the Midas touch here's a link https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midas

So in the goal of the game you move left and right touching stuff to turn to gold which makes your score greater. But if you touch the face you will loose. And if you let the chair touch the floor you will also  loose. 

Use the arrow keys to move

and this game was made for the mini game jam 7 

also this game is trash
